name: Johnson Fred
occupation: oil contractor or Turner Construction Company
description: Well, this is the hardest part of a profile, Is to describe yourself… Its like an interview except instead of finding a job, your actually looking or searching for your soul mate I guess its like an interview because your looking for the woman of your dreams, just like your looking for your dream job.. So Its a little crazy. If people really think about it.:: Its really funny and sometimes you wonder if this is a place for you.. Searching for the one you love and want to cherish this whole world with you.. I never thought I would be here looking for my Princess Charming / Best Friend / Partner/ Soul Mate/ and Lover..I’m Jason by name and I’ve a Black hair, 5”11 in height…I’m 50 yrs old going to turn 51 years soon. I’m widowed, single dad with a 8year old son name Michael.. I’m a Very easy going, good sense of humor, considerate. I’m here seeking for a woman that is loyal, honest, loving, not deceiving, caring, who has good family values also, cares for her personal appearance and the hygiene for a serious relationship and I am looking for a woman who will love me until the end of time…I mean a woman who will treat me like a king… A woman who will put smiles on my face as well as bring much happiness, joy and blessings to my life…I’m just looking for Someone who fills the missing parts of me.simple and happy people are my favorite..
